Actions.Name: Cut Through
Actions.Effects: The [name] may teleport to any point on the line after this ability resolves.

Actions.Name: Hunt
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range. While marked, the demon deals bonus damage against that foe, gains +1 boon on attack rolls against that foe, and may teleport 1 after that foe uses an ability. A marked foe can save against this mark at the end of their turns, ending it on a success.
